items.sentence: I thought that Tom would probably fail his French test.
I thought that Tom would speak French better than Mary.
Tom admitted he didn't really know how to speak French.
I've been thinking about the first time that I met Tom.
That was the first time that I was ever alone with Tom.
I'm not the one who told Tom he needed to study French.
I knew Tom wouldn't have to stay in Australia all week.
I know for sure that Tom moved to Australia a year ago.
I just heard that Tom and Mary are moving to Australia.
I doubt that Tom will want to go to Australia with you.
